title: 'Hamburglar' Pulls Off Spellbinding NHL Cinderella Story
teaser: Andrew the "Hamburglar" Hammond is a goalie for the Ottawa Senators, and he's on a winning streak. David Greene talks to Roy MacGregor, a columnist for Canada's The Globe and Mail newspaper.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
